function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exacerbation of gender inequality due to the impact of the pandemic on women and girls","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widening of income and wealth inequalities globally due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of disease prevention programs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic shutdown leading to small business closures and unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased likelihood of conflicts within and across borders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing disease prevention programs disrupted by focus on covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ill-equipped healthcare systems in developing countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health problems overlooked due to social isolation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics like the coronavirus disease can lead to significant psychological impact, exacerbated by socio-economic inequalities and uncertainty about the future.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overloaded health systems and fear of infection deter people from seeking medical care, leading to potential high mortality rates and strain on health facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in global poverty due to covid-19 economic shutdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the epidemic through international travel","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to perform all work remotely , in travel, agriculture, manufacturing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of widespread transmission in public settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on the development of a vaccine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the analysis and synthesis of a wide range of materials from online sources.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical assessment of covid-19 impacts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of systemic influences on impact","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly infectious virus transmitted through droplets from infected individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Origins of the virus in wuhan, an industrialized city in china","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immediate economic impacts of the virus on international trade, air travel, and employment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification and classification of the novel covid-19 virus","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed reaction to pandemic threat","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downplaying the threat of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of certain sustainable development goals sdgs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Famine due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on vulnerable populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Silent reintroduction and transmission of wild poliovirus type 1 in sewage","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Applicability of wbe to sars-cov-2 for prompt detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through sewage contamination and wastewater","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on molecular methods for quantifying virus concentration in raw sewage","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of wastewater surveillance data with clinical data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low incidence of reported human infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High number of active cases contributing to virus circulation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in urban wastewaters","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in influent samples from multiple wastewater treatment plants.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus concentration below the limit of detection of the assay","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal treatment for virus inactivation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retesting for confirmation of results","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of sars-cov-2 genome sequences","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low sensitivity of real-time rt-qpcr assay","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of pcr reagents and samples in a laboratory setting poses a risk of contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested pcr with multiple cycles can increase the risk of contamination and false positives.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sample rna during cdna synthesis can lead to contamination and inaccurate results.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested rt-pcr assays without standardization for sars-cov-2 detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of sewage with viral rna from covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
